name: CovertStrike
description:
Controls 

-------------------------------------------------

WASD - move around 

SPACE - Shoot missile

Enter - Toggle door gunner 

M - Map 

Hints: 

Land back at ship or "hidden strip" to ream and refuel 

Enable door gunner and circle the targets

-------------------------------------------------

Good morning, gentlemen.

this is a tribute to one of my favorite games while I was growing up... now set in the vietnam war era.  You play as a US pilot undercover with south vietnam colors bringing havoc to enemy lines while trying to rescue your fellow pilots captured by Vietcong forces.    

Solo dev, unfortunately i  started to work in the middle of jam but wanted to submit as this game marks one year of game dev for me (I started on GBjam8)

Models are made with blender.
